channel.title: Important!
channel.description: I have a server with a ParScape v2 source. Every time I try and log on after I log out it says im banned! How can i fix it. Well to make it simple. If i log in it creates an account. I log out and try to login agian and im banned! how do i make it so this wont happen?

item.title: Important!
item.dc:creator: @matimo9999 matimo9999
item.description:
@matimo9999 wrote:

look in client.java and look up the login protocalls and look to see if it has a automatic ban enabled in there, if that dosnt work do the same thing in player.java and see if theres a autoban enabled. hope that helps a bit

Read full topic

item.title: Important!
item.dc:creator: @Bigbucks Bigbucks
item.description:
@Bigbucks wrote:
